import flaggedStyles from "../../../utils/flagged-styles";
// import {unitMath} from "../../utils/css-utils";
import getMessageVars from "./message.var";

      opacity: ${closeOpacity};
      transition: ${closeTransition};
      
      &:hover {
        opacity: 1;
        color: inherit;
      }
      
 
    `),
